title: Ben Affleck the family man teaches his kids how to rollerblade
text:
Ben Affleck seemed every inch the superdad on Saturday as he was spotted giving his son Samuel and daughter Seraphina a rollerblading lesson on the streets of the Brentwood neighborhood of LA.

The Justice League actor was casual in a multi-colored plaid button-up and straight leg medium-wash jeans.

Affleck, 47, allowed seven-year-old Samuel and ten-year-old Seraphina to hold on tightly to his arms as they navigated the pavement in roller blades.

Daddy duty: Ben Affleck seemed every inch the superdad on Saturday as he was spotted giving his son Samuel and daughter Seraphina a roller blading lesson on the streets of the Brentwood neighborhood of LA

The two both wore helmets and graphic tees as they enjoyed their day in the SoCal sun.

Earlier in the day Affleck was seen leaving Seraphina's soccer game alongside ex-wife Jennifer Garner.

Garner, 47, wore a mesh jersey-like top with black leggings and had a duffel bag slung over her shoulder.

She shaded her vision with black wayfarer sunglasses and stayed glued to her phone during the sighting.

Active: The Justice League actor was casual in a multi-colored plaid button-up and straight leg medium-wash jeans

Affleck was saddled with equipment duty as he carried the lawn chairs and umbrellas back to the car.

The pair wed in June 2005 and finalized their divorce in October of last year.

Although they're no longer together, they remain amicable and are often seen with their children and attending church as a family.

On-the-go: Earlier in the day Affleck was seen leaving Seraphina's soccer game alongside ex-wife Jennifer Garner

Jennifer is busy with three projects up her sleeve including a TV series called, My Glory Was I Had Such Friends.

The Juno star also has roles coming up in Yes Day and Fantasy Camp.

Meanwhile, Ben has some projects of his own in the works.

He's set to produce, direct and star in a new version of Witness for the Prosecution and World War II drama Ghost Army.

The actor is also lined up to star in several movies including a Jay and Silent Bob Reboot and an as yet untitled sequel to 2016's The Accountant.
